title: PREVIEW: No. 11 Tech at No. 20 Texas - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: PREVIEW: No. 11 Tech at No. 20 Texas - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: A mix of sports and soap opera will be on display when No. 11 Texas Tech and No. 20 Texas meet for the second time this season at 11:30 a.m. on Saturday at the Frank Erwin Center in Austin. Tech head coach Mark Adams led the Red Raiders to a 77-64 win over the Longhorns in the first matchup on February 1 in Lubbock following a coaching change that saw him take over the program from Chris Beard who left for Texas last April.
